DOC.brief_summary: We randomize patient receive laparoscopic surgery benign gynecologic disease double dose ( Experimental Group ) single dose ( Control Group ) antiemetic . We compare degree postoperative nausea vomit experimental control group .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Antiemetics Reduce Postoperative Nausea Vomiting
DOC.criteria: Laparoscopy benign gynecologic disease Vomiting within 24 hour surgery Not use patient control analgesic postoperatively
